title: Adding an event
description: Fill out the form below to add an event.

elements.name: public
elements.title: Do you want to add a public or private event?

elements.name: facebook_how_to
elements.html:
Click to expand:

How to add Facebook events (desktop)
1. Log into Facebook on your web browser. You must be logged into Facebook in order to download .ics file versions of Facebook events.
2. Open the Facebook event on your web browser.
3. Click the ... button.
4. Click 'Add to calendar'.
5. With the 'Add to calendar' radio button selected, click the Export button.
6. This will download an .ics file. Save it and note the download location and filename.
7. Upload that .ics file in this form.
8. See below a short animation of steps 2–5:

(Advanced) How to add Facebook events from a mobile device
Important note: Facebook events can only be downloaded from a web browser while logged in and using the desktop version of the site.
If the URL starts with m., you're on the mobile version. Also, many mobile browsers will try to open the Facebook app instead of staying in the browser.
Because of these limitations, adding events from mobile is difficult, though not impossible. We recommend using a desktop/laptop whenever possible.
If you're able to stay in the desktop version of Facebook in your mobile browser and reach the event page without launching the Facebook app, you can follow the same steps as in the desktop instructions above.

elements.name: private_event_detail
elements.html:
Creating a Private Event on Mobilizon

Private events are not listed publicly and can only be accessed via a direct link. However, this form cannot be used to create private events.

To create a private event, follow these steps:

Step 1: Go to the Mobilizon site hosted by Vermont.Events at vermontmobilizon.xyz
Step 2: Register for an account.
Step 3: Confirm your email address to verify your account.
Step 4: Log in and go to the "My Events" section.
Step 5: Fill in your event details. When you reach the setting labeled "Who can view this event and participate", choose the option "Only accessible through link (private)".

Once published, your private event will be accessible only through the link you share. The event won't appear in public searches or listings. The link remains the same, so you can make updates or post announcements as needed.

Visitors can easily add the event to their calendars using Mobilizon’s built-in tools. Those with Mobilizon accounts can also RSVP and receive reminders.

elements.name: upload_method
elements.title: How do you want to add this event?

elements.name: dump_text
elements.title: Please paste the unstructured event information below

elements.name: url_list
elements.title: Paste one or more URLs
elements.description:
If adding multiple URLs, put each URL on a separate line.
Web pages and .ics links are supported.
These links will be automatically queried upon moderator approval.
Please note that this process cannot be automated with social media links, so social media links may have a delay in processing. To speed up processing of social media links, we recommend you use the manual event add option.

elements.name: event_url
elements.title: Event URL
elements.description:
If the event has a public URL link, please include it here.
Please note that social media links can be included here. However, if this is not a social media link, it may be more appropriate for you to add this event through the URL section of the form.

elements.name: description
elements.title: Description
elements.description: Please describe the event in at least a few sentences. If the event has official text, please paste it here.

elements.name: venue
elements.title: Venue
elements.description: If the event is happening at a named venue, e.g. Rutland Public Library, please include it here.

elements.name: locality
elements.title: Select your Vermont town or city

elements.name: region
elements.title: State
elements.description: Please only submit events that are occurring in VT or nearby in adjacent regions

elements.name: country
elements.title: Country
elements.description: Please only submit events that are occurring in the United States or just across the Canadian border

elements.name: category
elements.title: Category
elements.description: Please select an event category from below. If more than one category applies, please select the one that is most applicable, or "Community" if you're not sure.

elements.name: user_information_bool
elements.title: Would you like to provide some information about yourself?
elements.description: All information you provide is entirely optional.

elements.name: question5
elements.html:
If you'd like, you can share more information about yourself below.
How is this information stored and used?
This information is currently used only for the following purposes:
— Understanding general user demographics
— Reaching out to users who indicate interest in becoming approved contributors
There is no user outreach (e.g. newsletters or announcements) unless you specifically indicate that you’re interested in becoming an approved contributor.
All data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS) and at rest (AES), with a unique encryption key per entry. Data is stored on Dropbox and deleted after 30 days. Event details submitted through the form may be retained.

elements.name: approved_contributor
elements.title: Are you an approved contributor?
elements.description: Approved contributors fill out a different form.

elements.name: age_range
elements.title: How old are you?
elements.description: You must be 18 years or older to submit any more personal details.

elements.name: minor_text
elements.html: You have indicated that you are a minor. Unfortunately it is against our policy to collect any personal details of minors, and minors cannot become approved contributors at this time. Thank you for your contribution!

elements.name: prefer_not_to_say_age_text
elements.html: It is totally understandable that you do not want to provide your age! However, without confirming that you are not a minor, we cannot collect any more personal details from you. Thank you for your contribution!

elements.name: unapproved_who
elements.visibleIf: ({age_range} = 'r_18_24' or {age_range} = 'r_25_34' or {age_range} = 'r_35_44' or {age_range} = 'r_45_54' or {age_range} = 'r_55_64' or {age_range} = 'r_65_plus') and {approved_contributor} = false

elements.title: What describes your residence in relation to Vermont?

choices.text: Vermont Resident: I live in Vermont
Part-time Resident: I live in Vermont for part of the year
Border Resident: I do not live in Vermont but I live very close to the Vermont border
Non-Resident: I do not live in Vermont nor close to the Vermont border

elements.name: visit_frequency
elements.title: When do you spend time in Vermont? Select all that apply.
elements.description: Consider 'Frequently' to mean once or more per month.

elements.name: approved_interest
elements.visibleIf: ({age_range} = 'r_18_24' or {age_range} = 'r_25_34' or {age_range} = 'r_35_44' or {age_range} = 'r_45_54' or {age_range} = 'r_55_64' or {age_range} = 'r_65_plus') and {approved_contributor} = false

elements.name: approved_user_html
elements.visibleIf: ({age_range} = 'r_18_24' or {age_range} = 'r_25_34' or {age_range} = 'r_35_44' or {age_range} = 'r_45_54' or {age_range} = 'r_55_64' or {age_range} = 'r_65_plus') and {approved_interest} = true and {approved_contributor} = false
elements.html:
Why become an approved event contributor?
First, note that all users can view public events and create both public and private personal events. Users with a Mobilizon account can also publish their own events immediately, subject to moderation.
This submission form allows users to add events they didn’t organize themselves. To protect accuracy and quality, these submissions must be reviewed to ensure they are: 1) appropriate, 2) truly public in outreach intent, and 3) properly annotated.
Approved contributors receive simple training and are trusted to meet site standards. Their submissions are prioritized and may not require manual review. In contrast, unapproved submissions may be delayed, as all reviews are done by volunteers.
Becoming an approved contributor means you're a dedicated partner in our mission to grow access to local events—without relying on big tech. We ask approved contributors to actively seek out events to share, not just occasionally submit listings.
You can still contribute without being approved—approval simply lets us streamline your submissions and work more closely with you as the site evolves.

elements.name: user_email
elements.visibleIf: ({age_range} = 'r_18_24' or {age_range} = 'r_25_34' or {age_range} = 'r_35_44' or {age_range} = 'r_45_54' or {age_range} = 'r_55_64' or {age_range} = 'r_65_plus') and {approved_contributor} = false
elements.title: In order to become an approved contributor, you must provide contact information
elements.description: You may submit without this information, which we will use to gauge general public interest in contribution, but we will not be able to begin the approval process with you.

elements.name: fast_track_code
elements.title: Fast Track Code (Authorized users only)
elements.description: Approved contributors will be given a unique Fast Track Code to expedite their event processing. We trust these individuals to pre-review their submissions so they do not require moderation. Fast Track Codes do identify contributors to site admins, but are not personally identifiable on their own.
